argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspval.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspval.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. X -> W e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( Base ` w ) = ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 6 | 5, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( Base ` w ) = V ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_pweqd | |- ( w = W -> ~P ( Base ` w ) = ~P V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = W -> ( LSubSp ` w ) = S ) |
| 10 |  | #P_rabeq | |- ( ( LSubSp ` w ) = S -> { t e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | s C_ t } = { t e. S | s C_ t } ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( w = W -> { t e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | s C_ t } = { t e. S | s C_ t } ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_inteqd | |- ( w = W -> |^| { t e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | s C_ t } = |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) |
| 13 | 7, 12 | #P_mpteq12dv | |- ( w = W -> ( s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) |-> |^| { t e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | s C_ t } ) = ( s e. ~P V |-> |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_df-lsp | |- LSpan = ( w e. _V |-> ( s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) |-> |^| { t e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | s C_ t } ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_eqeltri | |- V e. _V |
| 17 | 16 | #P_pwex | |- ~P V e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_mptex | |- ( s e. ~P V |-> |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) e. _V |
| 19 | 13, 14, 18 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( W e. _V -> ( LSpan ` W ) = ( s e. ~P V |-> |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) ) |
| 20 | 4, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. X -> ( LSpan ` W ) = ( s e. ~P V |-> |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) ) |
| 21 | 3, 20 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( W e. X -> N = ( s e. ~P V |-> |^| { t e. S | s C_ t } ) ) |
